unnormalised: **Auto Buzz: New Wheels Hit Indian Roads!**
normalised: Auto Buzz: New Wheels Hit Indian Roads!

unnormalised: Namaste, gearheads! The Indian automotive scene is buzzing with new vehicle launches!
normalised: Namaste, gearheads! The Indian automotive scene is buzzing with new vehicle launches!

unnormalised: First up, Maruti Suzuki finally dropped the Jimny 5-door! Expect rugged adventures from Ladakh to Kanyakumari. Prices starting at around Rs. 12 lakh, a tad steep, but hey, it's a Jimny!
normalised: First up, Maruti Suzuki finally dropped the Jimny five-door! Expect rugged adventures from Ladakh to Kanyakumari. Prices starting at around rupee twelve lakh, a tad steep, but hey, it's a Jimny!

unnormalised: Then, Tata Motors unveiled their sleek new Nexon facelift. It's got a killer new look and promises improved mileage. Dr. Sharma from ARAI gave it a thumbs up after rigorous testing.
normalised: Then, Tata Motors unveiled their sleek new Nexon facelift. It's got a killer new look and promises improved mileage. Dr. Sharma from A R A I gave it a thumbs up after rigorous testing.

unnormalised: Not to be left behind, Mahindra is teasing something big for Diwali – could it be the electric Scorpio-N? Fingers crossed!
normalised: Not to be left behind, Mahindra is teasing something big for Diwali – could it be the electric Scorpio-N? Fingers crossed!

unnormalised: Meanwhile, a swanky new dealership, “Desi Drives,” opened in Connaught Place, offering a sprawling 5000 sq ft showroom. Perfect for drooling over your dream machine.
normalised: Meanwhile, a swanky new dealership, “Desi Drives,” opened in Connaught Place, offering a sprawling five thousand square feet showroom. Perfect for drooling over your dream machine.

unnormalised: And lastly, Royal Enfield launched limited edition Himalayan bikes painted with colors inspired by the Spiti Valley. Time to pack your bags and hit the road! Happy driving, folks!
normalised: And lastly, Royal Enfield launched limited edition Himalayan bikes painted with colors inspired by the Spiti Valley. Time to pack your bags and hit the road! Happy driving, folks!
